Auto Trim

Toolbar / Icon:
       
Menu: Modify > Auto Trim
Shortcut: A, X
Commands: autotrim | ax

Description:

Trims or extends an entity on both sides to the next limiting entities.

Procedure:

  • Choose the entity you want to trim or extend by clicking the segment you want to keep. The entity is automatically trimmed or extended, so that the two end points align with the next two entities.
